title: By the King. A proclamation, prohibiting the planting, setting and sowing of tobacco in England and Ireland, according to an Act of Parliament herein specified
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
publisher: Printed by John Bill, Printer to the King's most Excellent Majesty, 1661. At the King's Printing-House in Black-Friers,
notes: Dated at end: Given at Our Court at Whitehall, the twenty ninth day of March, in the thirteenth year of Our Reign, one thousand six hundred sixty one.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
